newsitem.title: USA: CMG Information to pay venture dividend.
newsitem.headline: CMG Information to pay venture dividend.

text.p: CMG Information Services Inc said Wednesday it will distribute to shareholders one share of Lycos Inc stock for every 16 shares held of CMG stock.
The company said cash will be distributed in lieu of fractional shares on a proportional basis based on the closing price of Lycos stock on June 5.
CMG said it will distribute the dividend July 31 to shareholders of record on June 5.
The dividend is the first under a new venture dividend program connected to CMG's CMG@Ventures Internet investments, the company said.
CMG@Ventures has invested $3.7 million in Lycos and holds about 59 percent of Lycos outstanding common shares, CMG said.
The dividend declaration will result in a one-time gain in CMG's fourth quarter ended July 31. The dividend distribution is not expected to reduce CMG's holdings in Lycos below the 50 percent level.
Tax consequences for CMG shareholders will vary, it said.
